Description.Text: The 3-star Amsterdam Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in London. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, airport transfer are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature internet access â€“ wireless, heating, wake-up service, desk, balcony/terrace. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include garden. Convenience and comfort makes Amsterdam Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in London.
